title: 2B2B With Stainless Steel Appliances - Immediate Move-In Price
posting_body: Spacious and delightful, this two-bedroom apartment is over 1,000 square feet and includes two bathrooms to accommodate all of your needs.
Complete with a full-size washer and dryer, crown molding, and stainless-steel appliances, your new home will be ready to entertain!
Mountain Gate is an apartment community that is conveniently located near trails, shopping, and quick access to C-470!
Explore the department stores at Aspen Grove or the local shops in downtown Littleton.
Our community features several year-round amenities including a year-round heated pool, shuffle board, and MORE!
Our entertainment areas are available to rent for private events!
Less than one mile from the light rail, our location gives you access to the hottest spots around!
Federal law prohibits housing discrimination on the basis of race, color, national origin, religion, sex, familial status, or disability.
